colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component.

defaultIsChecked.description: If `true`, the checkbox will be initially checked.

isChecked.description: If `true`, the checkbox will be checked.

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the form control will be disabled.

isIndeterminate.description: If `true`, the checkbox will be indeterminate.

isInvalid.description: If `true`, the form control will be invalid.

isReadOnly.description: If `true`, the form control will be readonly.

isRequired.description: If `true`, the form control will be required.

name.description: The HTML `name` attribute used for forms.

onBlur.description: The callback invoked when the checkbox is blurred.

onChange.description: The callback invoked when the checked state changes.

onFocus.description: The callback invoked when the checkbox is focused.

tabIndex.description: The tab-index property of the underlying input element.

value.description: The value to be used in the checkbox input.

grow.type: (string & {}) | "initial" | "inherit" | "-moz-initial" | "revert" | "revert-layer" | "unset" | (number & {}) | Partial<Record<Breakpoint, FlexGrow | [FlexGrow, FlexGrow]>> | [...] | Partial<...> | [...] | ((theme: StyledTheme) => UIValue<...>)

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the form control will be disabled.

isInvalid.description: If `true`, the form control will be invalid.

isNative.description:
If `true`, input elements will receive `checked` attribute instead of `isChecked`.

This assumes, you're using native radio inputs.

isReadOnly.description: If `true`, the form control will be readonly.

isRequired.description: If `true`, the form control will be required.

items.description: If provided, generate checkboxes based on items.

onChange.description: The callback fired when any children checkbox is checked or unchecked.

shrink.type: (string & {}) | "initial" | "inherit" | "-moz-initial" | "revert" | "revert-layer" | "unset" | (number & {}) | Partial<Record<Breakpoint, FlexShrink | [FlexShrink, FlexShrink]>> | [...] | Partial<...> | [...] | ((theme: StyledTheme) => UIValue<...>)

value.description: The value of the checkbox group.

wrap.type: "initial" | "inherit" | "wrap" | "-moz-initial" | "revert" | "revert-layer" | "unset" | "nowrap" | "wrap-reverse" | Partial<Record<Breakpoint, FlexWrap | [FlexWrap, FlexWrap]>> | [...] | Partial<...> | [...] | ((theme: StyledTheme) => UIValue<...>)

defaultValue.description: The initial value of the checkbox group.

isNative.description:
If `true`, input elements will receive `checked` attribute instead of `isChecked`.

This assumes, you're using native radio inputs.

onChange.description: The callback fired when any children checkbox is checked or unchecked.

value.description: The value of the checkbox group.
